data.text: @McElroyFamily @TheZoneCast Why were the DC shows postponed 9 months?

@McElroyFamily @TheZoneCast So eager to sell tickets that you forgot to post the newest episode here.
I’m curious to see if Justin will be completely sloshed at all these shows too.
@JakeBlumenfeld @Calcifer_S @McElroyFamily Same…. I’m weak and the fees won’t stop me.
@Calcifer_S @McElroyFamily Unfortunately that’s how much it was. Should be criminal! But I paid anyways because the boys are worth it. Wish that money was going towards them though…
@McElroyFamily I said this on Facebook but it’s important so saying it here too: thank you for requiring masks and clean tests/ vaccination. Helps us feel safe going.
@McElroyFamily Is there supposed to be $17 in transaction and service fees for the Portland show? Not sure if the site is glitching and I should wait to order
@McElroyFamily I fully expect a prom-style backdrop for photo ops
@McElroyFamily @JustinMcElroy Alsoooo maybe just add a cute lil San Francisco show in the mix while you’re over here on the Pacific? 🥺👉🏻👈🏻🥺
@McElroyFamily @JustinMcElroy Ok I may have gone overboard…
